imdb.title: Amaama to Inazuma
imdb.plot: Six months after his wife's death, a highschool teacher struggles to raise his daughter due to his inability to cook. When he meets an introverted student, who's also a part-time cook, he decides to learn to cook good meals for hi...

episodes.title: Uniforms and Pot Rice
episodes.plot: After a teacher called Kouhei Inuzuka wife dies he and his daughter only eat packaged meals. When Kouhei saw his daughter excited about some food she saw on the TV he took her to a restaurant.

episodes.title: Pork Soup and Restaurant Lights
episodes.plot: Kohei makes food for Tsumugi. The two go back to the restaurant but this time Kohei helps with the cooking.

episodes.title: Tsumugi and the Long Awaited Hamburg Steak
episodes.plot: Tsumugi gets in an argument with a boy at her nursery because some of the girls gave her clay. Tsumugi feels down but after eating the Hamburg steak that Kohei and Kotori made her mood gets better.

episodes.title: Hated Vegetables and Bits in Gratin
episodes.plot: Tsumugi doesn't like some vegetables so Kohei and Kotori focus on making food with vegetables.

episodes.title: A Day Off and Special Doughnuts
episodes.plot: Kotori sees Tsumugi with a man that she doesn't recognize, she later finds out that the man is called Yagi and friends with Kohei. Kohei and Kotori decide to make doughnuts.

episodes.title: A Gyoza Party with Friends
episodes.plot: Kotori's friend Shinobu finds out that she and Kohei are making food. Everyone decides to have a party where they cook dumplings. Kohei, Kotori, Tsumugi, Shinobu, and Yusuke Yagi all go to the party.

episodes.title: Gohei Mochi and a Grand Adventure
episodes.plot: Kohei is sick so Tsumugi goes out to Kotori. When Tsumugi comes back Kohei yells at her for leaving the house on her own. Kohei and Tsumugi make up and Kotori makes rice but burns it so she makes something else using the same rice.

episodes.title: Squid and Taro Stew That's Still Yummy Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Kohei doesn't go to school because it's parents day at Tsumugi's nursery. Kohei asks Tsumugi what she would like him to make and she says squid. Kohei asks Kotori to help him make squid.

episodes.title: Our Family's At-Home Curry
episodes.plot: Tsumugi has a sleep over at her nursery. When Tsumugi was at the nursery she mentioned that she liked home curry so Kohei decides to make dry curry with Kotori.

episodes.title: Summer Vacation, Kitty, and Aji
episodes.plot: Kohei and Tsumugi go to the beach but leave early because it's hot when leaving a family gives them three fish. The two go to Kotori's home to fillet the fish, when they arrive they get help from Shinobu as well.

episodes.title: A Play and Sweet Potato Crêpes
episodes.plot: Tsumugi has a disagreement with her friend about who gets to play a character for her nursery play. Kotori will be making crepes for her school festival so everyone decides to make crepes.

episodes.title: Okonomiyaki Filled with Affection
episodes.plot: Tsumugi and Kohei eat at a restaurant but leave because Tsumugi starts crying, after that, they go to cook at Kotori's house with Kortori, Shinobu, and Yagi. Everyone finally meets Kotori's mother.
